query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_analytics_reports (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  report_type ENUM('device_health','energy_consumption','utilization','maintenance','alerts','custom') NOT NULL,
  device_ids JSON,
  group_ids JSON,
  metrics JSON NOT NULL,
  time_range VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '7d',
  aggregation ENUM('minute','hour','day','week','month') DEFAULT 'hour',
  filters JSON,
  chart_config JSON,
  schedule_enabled INT DEFAULT 0,
  schedule_frequency ENUM('daily','weekly','monthly'),
  schedule_time VARCHAR(10),
  recipients JSON,
  last_generated_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_iot_analytics_report_type (report_type),
  INDEX idx_iot_analytics_created_by (created_by)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_dashboard_widgets (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  widget_type ENUM('device_status','health_score','alerts','chart','map','kpi','custom') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  config JSON NOT NULL,
  position JSON NOT NULL,
  size JSON NOT NULL,
  refresh_interval INT DEFAULT 30,
  is_visible INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_iot_widgets_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_iot_widgets_type (widget_type)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_analytics_reports (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  report_type ENUM('device_health','energy_consumption','utilization','maintenance','alerts','custom') NOT NULL,
  device_ids JSON,
  group_ids JSON,
  metrics JSON NOT NULL,
  time_range VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '7d',
  aggregation ENUM('minute','hour','day','week','month') DEFAULT 'hour',
  filters JSON,
  chart_config JSON,
  schedule_enabled INT DEFAULT 0,
  schedule_frequency ENUM('daily','weekly','monthly'),
  schedule_time VARCHAR(10),
  recipients JSON,
  last_generated_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_iot_analytics_report_type (report_type),
  INDEX idx_iot_analytics_created_by (created_by)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_dashboard_widgets (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  widget_type ENUM('device_status','health_score','alerts','chart','map','kpi','custom') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  config JSON NOT NULL,
  position JSON NOT NULL,
  size JSON NOT NULL,
  refresh_interval INT DEFAULT 30,
  is_visible INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_iot_widgets_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_iot_widgets_type (widget_type)
);
